repo_description: A Boilerplate of GraphQL API built in Go + graphql-go + gorm

schemas.name: query.graphql

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/mattdamon108/go-graphql-api-boilerplate/blob/ae8ccda52546a3d251619647dfd7d1e16e510574/schema/Query/query.graphql:
type Query {
  getMyProfile: GetMyProfileResponse!
}
type GetMyProfileResponse {
  ok: Boolean!
  error: String
  user: User
}

# https://github.com/mattdamon108/go-graphql-api-boilerplate/blob/ae8ccda52546a3d251619647dfd7d1e16e510574/schema/shared.graphql:
type User {
  id: ID!
  email: String!
  password: String!
  firstName: String!
  lastName: String!
  bio: String
  avatar: String
  createdAt: String!
  updatedAt: String!
}

schemas.name: shared.graphql
schemas.content:
type User {
  id: ID!
  email: String!
  password: String!
  firstName: String!
  lastName: String!
  bio: String
  avatar: String
  createdAt: String!
  updatedAt: String!
}
